attributes.action: The media are acting above the law with "reality shows" and need more oversight
attributes.additional_details:
We have had a number of terrible tragedies following on from "reality shows". It must stop. The law must be followed.

Notable victims are Shilpa Shetty who was subjected to racial abuse, Jacintha Saldanha a nurse who committed suicide after an Australian radio show played a practical joke, Patrick Dauncey who fell off a cliff and was seriously hurt, Ajwinder Bains subjected to a "Truman Show" horrific, he wasn't allowed to stop it from proceeding despite multiple attempts.
attributes.background:
We have had a number of terrible tragedies following on from "reality shows" & ordinary people are being manipulated and put in danger.

Notable victims are Shilpa Shetty, Jacintha Saldanha, Patrick Dauncey, Ajwinder Bains

It must stop, existing laws should protect people in the UK

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. The enforcement of the law is the responsibility of the police and the courts, which are independent of the Government and Parliament. 

If you would like Parliament to change the law, you could start a new petition asking for a specific change.
